title: Research official student loan repayment aggregates for calibration
description:
## Research Findings

### UK Student Loan Repayments 2024-25 (SLC Official Statistics)

**England (HE):** £5.0bn total repayments
- Plan 1: £1.9bn (37%)
- Plan 2: £2.8bn (55%)
- Plan 3/Postgraduate: £0.3bn (7%)
- Plan 5: £41m (0.8%, voluntary only)

**Scotland:** £203m total repayments (primarily Plan 4)

**Wales:** ~£229m total repayments (6.9% increase from prior year)

**Northern Ireland:** £182m total repayments

**UK Total (estimated):** ~£5.6bn HE repayments

### Borrowers Making Repayments (England)
- 3.0m via HMRC (39.5% of those liable)
- 187k scheduled direct to SLC
- 147k voluntary direct to SLC

### Outstanding Balances
- England: £236.4bn (end March 2025)
- Scotland: £9.4bn
- Northern Ireland: £5.6bn
- Wales: ~£9-10bn (estimated)
- **UK Total: ~£260-295bn**

### Sources
- https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/student-loans-in-england-2024-to-2025
- https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/student-loans-in-scotland-2024-to-2025
- https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/student-loans-in-northern-ireland-2024-to-2025
- https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/student-loans-in-wales-2024-to-2025
